attributes.title: My sister got raped by Trump
attributes.review: The person who runs this app (Donald J. Trump) has a maliciously raped my 12 year old sister, he got her pregnant and is now 7 months pregnant with his baby. My 12 year old sister is just a child, she’s know traumatized for the rest of her life and Apple is still continuing to leave this person app running. My sister has gone to personal therapy and nothing is working. Everyday is a struggle for her because everytime she looks at her belly she’s reminded of who the father is. Do you know how devasting that is for A CHILD. The least you can do is take down this app. Please don’t not let this man continue to be president I may be young, but that doesn’t affect my knowledge. I know right from wrong and it’s time to stand against Trump and his sexualized ordeals.

attributes.title: gave me a concussion
attributes.review: i downloading this app to see when the next blm protest was because apparently according to this cheeto man (idk who he is) he supports black people? and the LGBTQ+ community? idk honestly i don’t believe him. fake news. anyways, i was on a run when i heard a notification and thought oh yay i might get to know when the next protest is happening, BUT THEN as i opened the app i RAN INTO A POLE. this pole was hard and metal and it’s all thanks to this god forsaken app that i now have a trump sized dent in my forehead. i had to go to the hospital and get an MRI because they think i’m going to die. this app should be banned! i’m afraid of what it’ll do to my kids! what if it influences my kids to open, mid sprint and they run into a pole like i did?! it’s dangerous and should not be on the app store.

attributes.title: Big keisha
attributes.review: my name is big keisha and I’m 78 years old so I open up this app to see when the next rally was and all of a sudden , my cat stared going crazy and all of a sudden my phone started glitching and I exited the app and there was the orange Cheeto man himself right there on my wallpaper, then my cat looked out the window so I did too , and there he was orange Cheeto man right outside my house, me and my cat immediately ran to my room and then some how the orange Cheeto man was in my room my cat freaked out started scratching the heck out of the orange Cheeto man while my cat was doing that I ran out the house to only see the orange Cheeto man out there AGAIN , and my cat ran out the house and started attacking the orange Cheeto man then the orange Cheeto man just disappeared, anyway I would suggest not getting this app :))).

attributes.title: horrific
attributes.review: before I downloaded the app I was having a perfect day😌 but then ❌ my day began to get worse and worse it felt like I was being watched through my screen and being forced to learn about politics. then as my day went on my phone began to glitch out and stop working. And then I saw a naked man randomly appear on my screen 🤮 not only was I sitting next to my little cousin we were both traumatized after and I don’t think I could ever unsee that!  But once I deleted the app my day slowly went back to normal😌💅 and then I had to re- download so I could leave my review and now I’m going to delete the app once again and my life will be back to normal but I’ll still be traumatized if it wasn’t for this app my eyes would still be pure! 😡

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: The reason I’m rating this 1 star is not because I’m young and ignorant. People need to understand who trump is as a person. Ever since this country became independent, it was MADE of immigrants. You know who built nyc and other huge cities? IMMIGRANTS. My family is immigrants too and they are the hardest working people you’ll ever meet. And they are very loyal. So many of them are thankful for America and the opportunities, yet the PRESIDENT OF THE USA is banning them from the country they call home and have been so loyal to. You’re not just voting for a president for business and economic reasons, you’re voting for a person who has good morals and is a good representative for what America stands for. That’s why I’m leaving a 1 star. I hope this changes some trump supports minds, and even hope trump sees this.

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: This app is awful treacherous it gave my phone 10 viruses and now my phone keeps glitching. It also did the same thing to my Samsung and now I can’t use it at all without it overheating. That’s not the only problem, when I tried to delete the app it deleted all my photos and all of my apps and gave my fish dysentery, fly high little jerry😢. It also put a whole bunch of photos of trump and some of them were very unsettling and posted them on all of my social media platforms and when I tried to move some of my pictures onto my laptop from my phone it corrupted all of my files. This app should be taken down and I just can’t believe that this was even allowed on the App Store. 0/10 we will not be dining again👎🏻

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER😒🍊
attributes.review: Today I downloaded this app to show my support to the orange God “OuR pReSiDeNt” but when I downloaded it I couldn’t even open the app and whenever I tried to I started seeing Trump around my house my eyes we’re trembling I barely can even see anymore The site of the orange god made my eyes bleed but I thought it was nothing so I kept the app and took and nap to make my eyes feel better 2 hours later I saw TRUMP THE ORANGE GOD🍊 IN MY HOUSE my eyes were just starting to get better before he came but trump wasn’t alone he was with his minions they were orange and had no eyes they and trump told me to give 5 stars or I would never see again I ran to my phone and deleted the app as they were chasing me but now I’m ok AND I WILL NEVER GET THIS APP AGAIN AND I NEED YOU TO DELETE THIS APP BEFORE IT HAPPENS TO ANYONE ELSE😗🍊
